tasks.task_description: Kill existing Xvfb and Sunshine processes
Start window manager on virtual display
Configure Sunshine to use virtual display

description: Set up proper virtual display for Sunshine streaming
context: Started Xvfb on :1 with 1920x1080 resolution and openbox window manager. Added xfce4-panel for desktop environment.
Set up virtual display :2 with proper X11 authorization and started Sunshine on it. Virtual display should now be available for streaming.
